Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア
Entry.EnglishText: Claire

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ
Entry.EnglishText: Monica

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ・集会所前
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz - Front of Town Hall

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ・集会所前
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz - Front of Town Hall

Entry.JapaneseText: 集会所
Entry.EnglishText: Town Hall

Entry.JapaneseText: うっ……クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh...Claire!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア、クレアはどこだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire, where is Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアさんはいないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: She's gone...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……！ そうだ、<Eugene>、あんたが!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...! That's right, <Eugene>, you...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああするしかなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: I had no choice.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえの力では…… いいや、俺たち三人で戦っても、 サレ相手では分が悪い。
Entry.EnglishText: If you, at your current level... No, even if the three of us had fought together, we would still be no match for Saleh.

Entry.JapaneseText: サレはふざけたヤツだけど、 冷酷で残忍で……強いんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh might seem like he's playing around, but he's cruel and merciless...and really strong.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの時、<Eugene>が 止めなかったら、キミは殺されてた。 もちろん、女の子たちや ポプラおばさんも……
Entry.EnglishText: If <Eugene> didn't stop you, you'd be dead by now, along with the girls, and your Auntie Poplar as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか……
Entry.EnglishText: Are you serious...?

Entry.JapaneseText: サレは村人を皆殺しにしてでも クレアさんを連れて行っただろうね。 もちろん無傷で…… サレはそういうヤツさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh would've massacred everyone in the village and taken Claire anyway. All without taking a scratch... That's the kind of guy he is.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ、あいつの事を そこまで知っている…… おまえたちは何者なんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: How do you know so much about him...? Just who the hell are you guys!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 元隊長と脱走兵だよ。
Entry.EnglishText: He's a former commander and I'm a deserter.

Entry.JapaneseText: 半年前まで、<Eugene>は <Blue>王の盾<White>の隊長だった。 そして、ボクはその下で働いていた。
Entry.EnglishText: Six months ago, <Eugene> was the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>'s commander, and I worked under him.

Entry.JapaneseText: だった……？
Entry.EnglishText: Was...?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアさんの家で話したとおり、 俺は、陛下の死に始まった 一連の異変の真相を調べていた。
Entry.EnglishText: As I was saying back at Claire's house, after His Majesty's passing, I began investigating the mysterious events surrounding his death.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ある事件がきっかけで、 軍を追われる事になった。
Entry.EnglishText: But after a certain incident, he was booted out of the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Mao>、おまえは なぜ脱走したんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: So why did you desert the army, <Mao>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>…… あの日、ボクのフォルスも目覚め、 暴走したみたい……
Entry.EnglishText: On the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White>... Apparently, my Force awakened and went berserk.

Entry.JapaneseText: みたい……？
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん。どうやらボクは、 そのショックで記憶を 失ったらしいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. I'm not sure how, but it seems like I lost my memories because of how traumatic it was.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>は、行くあてのないボクを <Blue>王の盾<White>に入れて、面倒を見てくれた。
Entry.EnglishText: Because I had nowhere to go, <Eugene> let me enlist in the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> so he could look after me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>が軍を出るならボクも出る。 そういうコトさ。
Entry.EnglishText: So if <Eugene> had to go, I had to go too. Simple as that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 記憶喪失、おまえが……
Entry.EnglishText: So you have amnesia?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今も記憶はないけど、 気にするコトはないよ。 大切なのは過去じゃない。 未来だ!! ……なんてネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I have no memories, but I have nothing I worry about, either. Besides, what's important isn't the past, it's the future! ...Or something.

Entry.JapaneseText: ………… おまえたちの事はわかった。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I think I get you guys now.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、オレはクレアを 守らなくてはならなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: But I should have saved Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、クレアさんはもう決めてたんだよ。 自分と引き換えに、 女の子たちを助けようって。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire made her choice. She gave herself up in exchange for the safety of all the other girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ…… あいつはそういうヤツだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes...that's how she is...

Entry.JapaneseText: だから……だからオレはあいつを…… クレアを守ってやりたかった……
Entry.EnglishText: But that's why... That's why I wanted to protect her...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレはクレアのために、 何もしてやれないのか!!
Entry.EnglishText: Is there really nothing I can do for her!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 残念だが、今のおまえでは サレを倒す事など 夢でもかなわんだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, in your current state, defeating Saleh is nothing more than a pipe dream.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだと!?
Entry.EnglishText: What did you just say!?

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、おまえには可能性がある。 数多くの能力者を見て来た 俺にはわかる。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I have seen many Force users in my day. I can see you have potential.

Entry.JapaneseText: 強くなるんだ、<Veigue>。 そして、クレアさんを救い出せ。 おまえの手で。
Entry.EnglishText: You WILL grow stronger, <Veigue>. ...And when you do, you'll be able to save Claire with your own hands.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……とにかく、 俺たちはこれから<Blue>王の盾<White>を追う。 連中の行動が気になる。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Anyway, let's go after the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. I find what they are doing to be concerning.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだね…… <Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>の一件に <Blue>王の盾<White>が一枚かんでる 可能性はあるネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sounds like a plan. It's likely that the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> might have some connection to what happened on the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつらの後を追えば、 何かつかめるかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: Following them might be the break that we need.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……さあ、キミはどうする？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, what about you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ………… 答えは決まっている。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I've made up my mind.

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>称号<Green>は各キャラクターに与えられるもので、 取得する事で、戦闘パラメータに ボーナスが付きます。
Entry.EnglishText: <Red>Titles<Green> are given to each character, and acquiring new Titles will confer bonuses to a character's stats.
Entry.Notes: this need some wordsmithing

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>取得した称号のボーナスは <Red>合計加算<Green>されますので、 どの称号を名乗るかは自由です。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Bonuses for Titles earned are <Red>totaled<Green> and you are free to choose which Title you wish to equip in the Status Menu.
Entry.Notes: this need some wordsmithing

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>取得条件が難しいものほど大きなボーナスが 付きますので、がんばって探して下さい。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>The more difficult they are to obtain, the bigger the bonus, so please do your best to find them.
Entry.Notes: this need some wordsmithing

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、見て……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, look...
What's this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 川辺で見つけた綺麗な石に 飾りをつけてみたの。 ちょっと早いけど、 誕生日のプレゼント。
Entry.EnglishText: I found this beautiful stone near the river, and used it to make a charm. I know it's early, but here's your birthday present!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ありがとう、クレア。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you, Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: うふふっ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Hehe! ♪

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、見て……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, look...
What's this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 川辺で見つけた綺麗な石に 飾りをつけてみたの。 ちょっと早いけど、 誕生日のプレゼント。
Entry.EnglishText: I found this beautiful stone near the river, and used it to make a charm. I know it's early, but here's your birthday present!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ありがとう、クレア。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you, Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Claire>？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、見て……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, look...

Entry.JapaneseText: 川辺で見つけた綺麗な石に 飾りをつけてみたの。 ちょっと早いけど、 誕生日のプレゼント。
Entry.EnglishText: I found this beautiful stone near the river, and used it to make a charm. I know it's early, but here's your birthday present!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの、<Veigue>？ もしかして気に入らなかった？ ごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong, Veigue? Do you not like it? I'm sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……い、いや、そんな事はない。 ありがとう……クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: N-No, it's not that. Thanks... Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア？ わたくしはアガーテよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire? But I'm Agarte.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ……？ クレアじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte...? You're not Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: いやだわ、<Veigue>が冗談を言ってる。 明日は雨がふるかもしれないわよ。 ねえ、ザピィ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Oh dearie, <Veigue>'s pulling my leg! That must mean it's going to rain tomorrow. Right, Zapie?♪
Entry.Notes: Princess Agarte saying pulling my leg seems odd

Entry.JapaneseText: キキーッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Kiki!!

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう事だ…… おまえは、クレアじゃないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on here? Are you not Claire...?

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、アガーテだってば。 ホントにおかしな<Veigue>…… ふふっ……ふふふふ……
Entry.EnglishText: I already said that I was Agarte, didn't I? You're acting really silly, <Veigue>... Hehehe!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかったよ、<Claire>……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I think I get it now, <Claire>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……アガーテ……
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こういう事なのですね…… クレアの言っていた言葉…… <Yellow>心に種族はない<White>って……
Entry.EnglishText: So this was what she was talking about... That our <Yellow>hearts have no such thing as race<White>...
Entry.Notes: Just making sure this is the right phrase

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… やっとわかったような気がする…… 理屈じゃなく、この心で……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I feel like I finally understand... That rather than overthinking things, I needed to trust my heart...

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々がこんな風に暮らしている事、 わたくしは知らなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: I was unaware that people were capable of living together like this.

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前は、もっと明るくて 楽しい村だった……
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz used to be a lot more lively and cheerful.

Entry.JapaneseText: それを奪ったのは、 わたくし……
Entry.EnglishText: And I had to go and ruin that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレには…… 国の事や国王の立場の事は よくわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: You know, I'll admit... I don't know much about how to rule a Kingdom, or what it's like being the ruler of one...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、覚えておいて欲しい。 オレたちは、こんな小さな事で 喜んだり、笑ったりするんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: But I want you to remember this... That something as simple as this was able to bring us joy and put smiles on our faces.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……忘れない……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I will never forget.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレは思う…… 世界中がこの村のように なればいい……
Entry.EnglishText: I think that the world would be better off if it were more like this village...

Entry.JapaneseText: そのためにオレは…… オレにできる限りの事をしたい……
Entry.EnglishText: And I'm willing to do all that I can in order to help it get there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたくしも、 同じ気持ちです。
Entry.EnglishText: I share your sentiment.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな国になれば…… わたくしのような過ちを犯す人は、 きっといなくなります……
Entry.EnglishText: And when that day comes... I am certain that there will no longer be those who would repeat the same mistakes I did.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレが言うのも何だが…… 今のあんたなら、 国を任せられる気がする。
Entry.EnglishText: This might not mean much coming from me, but... I feel that now you would serve as a fine ruler for this country.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……妙だな。 クレアとは、こんな風に 話をした事なんてなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, it's strange. I don't think I've ever had a conversation like this with Claire before.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、あんたとは これで二度目だ……
Entry.EnglishText: But this is the second time we've spoken like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ベルサスで話をした時、 あなたは気がついていたのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you realize that I was not Claire when we spoke together in Belsas?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… 何か変だと思ってはいたが……
Entry.EnglishText: No... But I did feel that something was off.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたはまだ…… ヒューマの身体が欲しいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Do you still want the body of a Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いいえ…… でも、もう元には……
Entry.EnglishText: No... But I'm not sure I'd be able to...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Yellow>ヒト<White>にとって大切なのは、 心だと思う……
Entry.EnglishText: I think what's really important when it comes to being <Yellow>Human<White> is one's heart...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、戻る事ができるなら、 それに越した事はない。
Entry.EnglishText: But if you can, I think you ought to return yourself and Claire back to normal.

Entry.JapaneseText: あきらめないで欲しい…… クレアと……あんたのために。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want you to give up... For Claire's sake... and for yours as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……クレア……クレア…… 私はどうしたらいいの……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh Claire...what should I have done...?
Entry.Notes: Npc line when not talking to veigue part 1 of 2

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてあの時、私は クレアを見ちゃったの…… どうして……
Entry.EnglishText: Why did I have to look your way...? Why...?
Entry.Notes: Npc line when not talking to veigue part 2 of 2

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……クレア……クレア…… 私……どうあやまれば……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh Claire...how am I going to make it up to you...?
Entry.Notes: talking with veigue before doing first part of SQ01 this is buble 1 of 2

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… 本当にごめんなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm so sorry, <Veigue>...
Entry.Notes: talking with veigue before doing first part of SQ01 this is buble 2 of 2

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… 本当にごめんなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm so sorry, <Veigue>...
Entry.Notes: Npc line when not talking to veigue after triggering the SQ01 part 2

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……ごめんなさい。 私のせいでクレアが 連れていかれてしまうなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry <Veigue>... It's my fault that Claire got kidnapped...
Entry.Notes: SQ01 Monica and Steve part 2

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカのせいじゃない。 あまり自分を責めるな…… スティーブも心配していたぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's not your fault, Monica. Don't go beating yourself up over it... You're worrying Steve.
Entry.Notes: SQ01 Monica and Steve part 2

Entry.JapaneseText: スティーブが……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Steve...!?
Entry.Notes: SQ01 Monica and Steve part 2

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつだけじゃない。 村のみんなも心配している。 元気を出せよ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not just him, everyone else is worried about you, too. So cheer up...
Entry.Notes: SQ01 Monica and Steve part 2

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも……でも……
Entry.EnglishText: But...but...
Entry.Notes: SQ01 Monica and Steve part 2

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ごめんなさい。 今は誰ともお話し したくないの……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry... I don't want to talk to anyone at the moment...

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめんなさい…… 今は何も話す気になれないの……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry...I don't feel like chatting right now...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私はどうしたら…… クレアのためにできる事は ないのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: What should I do...There's nothing that I can do for Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ、どうしたんだ？ みんなが心配していたぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter, Monica? Everyone is worried about you.

Entry.JapaneseText: だって……クレア…… クレアに申し訳なくって……
Entry.EnglishText: But, Claire... If I don't make it up to Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは無事に帰って来た。 もう終わったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire returned safely. It's all over now.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、クレアの目が覚めて、 私が会いに行った時……
Entry.EnglishText: But, when I went to see Claire... When she woke up...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは私の事がわからないって 顔をしたのよ…… それくらいつらい思いを……
Entry.EnglishText: ...she looked at me like I was a total stranger... To think I made her feel like that...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配はいらない…… クレアは元気だ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no need to worry. Claire is doing well.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアからも、 モニカに言ってやってくれ…… もう大丈夫だと。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire, she needs to hear that you're alright, coming from you.

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ……さん…… 私、本当に……平気です……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I would like to inform you that I am doing just fine...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あ、ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Th-Thank you...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、<Veigue>ならわかるでしょ？ 今の話し方……とっても他人行儀で 私……私……
Entry.EnglishText: But can't you see, <Veigue>? She's talking to me like I'm a total stranger...I...I...

Entry.JapaneseText: 考えすぎだ……
Entry.EnglishText: You're overthinking it...

Entry.JapaneseText: それより、どうして スティーブと話をしないんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Anyway, is there a reason why you haven't been talking to Steve?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かイヤな事でも言われたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did he say something to make you upset?

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そんな事……ないけど…… でも……でも……
Entry.EnglishText: No, nothing like that...but...but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>…… クレアが帰って来て よかったね……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank goodness Claire is back, <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……ごめんなさい。 今は誰ともお話ししたく ないの……
Entry.EnglishText: But...I'm sorry. I don't really want to talk to anyone right now...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>…… クレアが帰って来て よかったね……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank goodness Claire is back, <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……ごめんなさい。 今は誰ともお話ししたく ないの……
Entry.EnglishText: But...I'm sorry. I don't really want to talk to anyone right now...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ごめんなさい。 今は誰ともお話し したくないの……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry... I don't want to talk to anyone at the moment...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、もう逃げない…… 今度クレアに会った時は、 きちんと話してみる……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not going to run away anymore... The next time I see Claire, I'm going to have a proper conversation with her...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私、みんなに 心配ばかりかけちゃって…… 甘えてたのかも……
Entry.EnglishText: I've done nothing but make everyone worry... I guess I've been acting like a spoiled child...

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ…… そろそろ元気になっても いいんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Monica, don't you think you ought to start feeling better by now?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……でも……
Entry.EnglishText: But...but...

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ……さん…… 私もクレアの友だちだから わかるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Monica...I only know this because I am friends with Claire, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは、あなたの事、 恨んだり責めたりしないと思う。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think she blames you for what happened, and I don't think she's holding a grudge against you, either.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……そうかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Is...is that so...

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に戻って来られたんだし、 ちょっとした冒険だったわ、 なんて言うんじゃないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: She came back safely and now she's out on a little journey, wouldn't you say?
Entry.Notes: WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY WOULDNT YOU SAY

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うん……そうだったら いいんだけど……でも！
Entry.EnglishText: I...I guess it'd be okay if that were the case...but...!

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカさん！ あなたが そうやって悲しんでる事で、 つらい思いをしている人が いるんじゃないかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Monica! If you're going be unhappy all the time, don't you think that'll make others upset as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……
Entry.EnglishText: Wha-...

Entry.JapaneseText: 村の人たちや、<Veigue>も、 あなたの事を心配してるわ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and everyone else in the village, they're all worried about you!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……も……？
Entry.EnglishText: Even...Claire...?

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん！ だから笑って！ あなたの笑顔がクレアを 元気にするわ、きっと！
Entry.EnglishText: Absolutely! So you need to smile! If you have a smiling face, that'll make Claire feel better too, no doubt about it!

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そうね……そう、よね？ 私が泣いてたら、もっと心配 しちゃうのがクレアだもんね。
Entry.EnglishText: Is that so...you think? I guess if I'm moping around all the time, Claire can't help but worry more about me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、ちゃんと謝ってないし、 お礼だって言ってない……
Entry.EnglishText: I haven't even apologized or thanked her yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度、クレアが帰って来たら 私、ちゃんと話してみる。 それに、スティーブにも……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, when Claire gets back, I'll try talking to her. And Steve as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、がんばって！
Entry.EnglishText: That's right, you can do it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ごめんなさい。 今は誰ともお話し したくないの……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry... I don't want to talk to anyone at the moment...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、考えてたんです…… 何をって？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm thinking... About what?
Entry.Notes: Help

Entry.JapaneseText: それは……ええと……
Entry.EnglishText: Well that's...um...

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく…… 色々と……
Entry.EnglishText: Things like... Y'know...

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなに迷惑かけたわ…… <Veigue>にも……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been such a bother to everyone... and to <Veigue> as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、もう逃げない…… 今度クレアに会った時は、 きちんと話してみる……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not going to run away anymore... The next time I see Claire, I'm going to have a proper conversation with her...

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなに迷惑かけたわ…… <Veigue>にも……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been such a bother to everyone... and to <Veigue> as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい地鳴り…… 何が起きてるのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Those tremors... I wonder what's happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こってるか、 わかんなくて不安だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Not knowing what's going on is making me anxious...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな時、あの人の事を 心に浮かべると、 何故か心が強くなった気がするの。
Entry.EnglishText: In times like this...somehow, thinking about my special someone strengthens my spirit...

Entry.JapaneseText: コワイわ……こんな時、 誰かがそばにいてくれたら……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm scared... I wish I had someone by my side at a time like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: この集会所は 光を信仰するために 作られたらしいわ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Meeting House was built as a place for people to worship light.
Entry.Notes: worshiping light?

Entry.JapaneseText: 集会所の奥にあるのが その光の紋章なの。
Entry.EnglishText: Towards the back, there is a crest with the symbol representing "light" on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
